column2: 《HKEx》- 01168 SINOLINK HOLD - JOINT ANNOUNCEMENT - (1) PROPOSED RIGHTS ISSUE OF RIGHTS SHARES ON THE BASIS OF FOUR RIGHTS SHARES FOR EVERY FIVE EXISTING SHARES AT HK$0.28 PER RIGHTS SHARE ON A NON-UNDERWRITTEN BASIS (2) APPLICATION FOR WHITEWASH WAIVER (3) APPOINTMENT OF INDEPENDENT FINANCIAL ADVISER (4) CLOSURE OF REGISTER OF MEMBERS AND (5) PROPOSED INCREASE IN AUTHORISED SHARE CAPITAL
